Topic.Title: How do I upload a game for editing online?

Posts.EditableText: I've found the upload page, but get the following error: [b:2z5qdsfv]Invalid file type - please use 'Publish' (from the Tools menu) to create a .quest file[/b:2z5qdsfv] I have Quest downloaded, but when I try to load the game on my PC I get this: [b:2z5qdsfv]Error: Cannot find a file called 'retrostyle.aslx' in current path or application/resource path'[/b:2z5qdsfv] Completely forgotten how to do anything with this software
Posts.HTML:
I've found the upload page, but get the following error:

Invalid file type - please use 'Publish' (from the Tools menu) to create a .quest file

I have Quest downloaded, but when I try to load the game on my PC I get this:

Error: Cannot find a file called 'retrostyle.aslx' in current path or application/resource path'

Completely forgotten how to do anything with this software

Posts.EditableText:
you did publish, right?

I think the 'publish' will convert your 'game_file_name.aslx' quest file into the 'game_file_name.quest' quest file that online requires.

(otehrwise, I'm of no other help, as I've never actually done any publishing of games online, lol. If the publishing isn't working, then from the error, you got your 'game_file_name.aslx' quest file in the wrong folder for the browser to find~use it, in order to convert it into the 'game_file_name.quest' file)

--------

P.S.

Welcome back! hopefully you otherwise remember how to use quest... it'd be a pain if you had to re-learn everything you learned... hehe (though I can try to help you re-learn if you did forget everything, lol)
